db:select.db:sql: select h.*,ha.city ha_city,ha.code ha_code,ha.state ha_state from hotel_address ha, hotels h where ha.hotel_id = h.hotel_id and ha.hotel_id = :hotel_id
select h.hotel_name, hb.* from hotel_bookings hb, hotels h where h.hotel_id = hb.hotel_id and booking_id = :bookingId

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/xml --- { body: { bookingId: payload.booking_id default 0, hotelId: (payload.hotel_id default ""), hotelName: payload.hotel_name default "", roomCategory: payload.category default "", customerName: (payload.customer_name default ""), customerContactNo: payload.customer_phno default "", noOfRooms: payload.no_of_rooms_booked default 0, duration: payload.duration default "", totalAmount: payload.totalamt default 0 } }

db:select.db:sql: SELECT h.*,ha.city ha_city,ha.code ha_code,ha.state ha_state FROM hotel_address ha, hotels h WHERE ha.hotel_id = h.hotel_id AND ha.city = :city
